compliance.subtitle: We built and tested the ELD with truckers in mind, which is why our extensive features offer a simplified experience.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Fully FMCSA compliant to pass your roadside inspections

dashboard.title: Smart Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Work smarter, not harder. We present our dashboard where you can access all vehicles and drivers information. Plan ahead of time for fuel, scale, weigh stations or upcoming weather.

monitor.title: Monitor every vehicle
monitor.description: All important vehicle information is in one place: vehicle and driver duty status, current location, current fuel level and speed. In addition, view drivers remaining HOS time and be on top of driver who are currently in HOS Violation.

map.title: Customizable Map
map.description: With customizable dashboard map you can choose the style you like the most. Use filters to view traffic, group vehicles, and find nearest Weigh Station, CAT Scales and wide variety of truck stops.

styles.title: Custom Map Styles
styles.description: Choose from multiple map styles to match your preferences

filtering.title: Advanced Filtering
filtering.description: Filter traffic data and group vehicles efficiently

facilities.title: Nearby Facilities
facilities.description: Locate nearest weigh stations, CAT scales, and truck stops

weather.title: Weather Map
weather.description: Plan ahead of time using weather filters. Stay informed about upcoming rain, snow, and storm conditions. Monitor temperature, humidity, and weather patterns across your routes.

updates.title: Real-time Weather Updates
updates.description: Access current weather conditions and forecasts

alerts.title: Storm Alerts
alerts.description: Get notified about severe weather conditions

location.title: Live Location Share
location.description: Satisfy your Brokers and Shippers by sharing your vehicle's live location. Remove the stress and concerns about the driver's location and arrival times.

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share location links with expiration dates

security.title: Secure Access
security.description: Control who can view driver information

eldHardware.title: ELD Hardware PT30
eldHardware.description: The ELD Hardware PT30 is a state-of-the-art electronic logging device designed to help commercial drivers comply with hours of service regulations. This compact and durable hardware connects directly to your vehicle's diagnostic port to accurately record driving time, engine hours, vehicle movement, and miles driven.

iorixDevice.title: IORIX ELD Device
iorixDevice.description: The IORIX ELD Device is an advanced electronic logging solution that offers reliable performance for fleet management. This device automatically tracks driver hours, simplifies DVIR, and provides real-time GPS tracking to keep your fleet compliant and efficient. Its user-friendly interface makes it easy for drivers to manage their logs and for fleet managers to monitor operations.

j1939Cable.title: J1939 Cable for 9-Pin
j1939Cable.description: J1939 has become the accepted industry standard and the vehicle network technology of choice for heavy-duty machines. This cable enables serial data communication of microprocessor systems (also called Electronic Control Units-ECU) in any kind of heavy-duty vehicles. The exchanged data includes vehicle road speed, torque control message from the transmission to the engine, oil temperature, and many more.

j1708Cable.title: J1708 Cable for 6-Pin
j1708Cable.description: The J1708 Cable for 6-Pin is designed for older model trucks that use the J1708 protocol. This reliable connection cable ensures consistent data transfer between your ELD device and the vehicle's ECM. Made with high-quality materials, this cable is built to withstand the demanding conditions of heavy-duty trucking operations.

pinCableVolvo.title: 16-Pin cable for Volvo/Mack
pinCableVolvo.description: This specialized 16-Pin cable is specifically designed for Volvo and Mack trucks, ensuring perfect compatibility with these vehicles' unique diagnostic systems. The cable facilitates seamless connection between your ELD device and the truck's diagnostic port, allowing for accurate data collection and Hours of Service logging.

pinCableRP1226.title: 14-Pin RP1226 Cable
pinCableRP1226.description: The 14-Pin RP1226 Cable is a specialized connector designed for heavy-duty vehicles that utilize the RP1226 standard diagnostic port. This high-quality cable ensures reliable data transmission between your ELD device and the vehicle's engine control module.

obd2Cable.title: 16-Pin OBD2 cable (Light/Medium Duty)
obd2Cable.description: The 16-Pin OBD2 cable is specifically designed for light and medium-duty vehicles equipped with standard OBD-II diagnostic ports. This universal connector provides reliable data communication between your ELD device and the vehicle's onboard computer system.

manualsPage.title: User Manuals
manualsPage.subtitle: Access comprehensive documentation to help you get the most out of your ELD system

needHelp.title: Need Additional Help?
needHelp.description: If you can't find what you're looking for in our manuals, our support team is ready to assist you 24/7. Contact us or watch our video tutorials for additional guidance.

termsPage.title: Terms
termsPage.introduction: These terms of service ("Agreement") constitute a contract between you and ElbrusElogs Inc, a Pennsylvania limited liability corporation, together with its employees, consultants, directors, successors, subsidiaries, affiliates, and assignees ("Company", "we" or "us") and governs the terms under which you may use services offered by us, whether on behalf of yourself or on behalf of a company or other entity for which you are authorized to act. If you are acting on behalf of an entity, this Agreement constitutes a contract between the Company and that entity, and you acknowledge that you have the authority to bind such entity and its affiliates to this Agreement. The terms "you" or "your" throughout this Agreement shall mean you personally and/or the entity on whose behalf you are acting.

description.title: Description of the Service
description.content: The service means the Company's electronic logging device and fleet management software and includes our websites, mobile websites, and mobile application and any updates or upgrades thereto (the "Service").

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: My pricing varies depending on the type of photoshoot and the specific requirements. For detailed pricing information, please reach out via the contact form, and I'll provide you with a personalized quote.

access.title: How can I access my photos after the shoot?
access.content: After the photoshoot, I will provide you with a private online gallery where you can view and download your edited photos. You'll receive a password-protected link that you can share with friends and family.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us through the Contact page or email us at admin@mjproconsulting.com.

privacyPage.title: Privacy
privacyPage.introduction: ElbrusElogs Inc takes your privacy very seriously. This Privacy Policy applies to the Service (as defined in our Terms of Service). Any terms used but not defined in this Privacy Policy have the meanings assigned to them in our Terms of Service.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: The primary reason we collect information from you is in order to provide you with our Service and to facilitate your use of the Service. We may collect the following information about you, which may include non-public personal information which can be used to identify an individual ("Personal Information").

account.title: Account and Profile Information
account.content: When accessing the Service, you provide us with Your Data and Personal Information, including but not limited to your name, mobile phone number, email address, mailing address and driver's license information. Personal Information that we collect may also include documentation uploaded to your account by you or third parties to whom you have granted access to your account (including but not limited to motor vehicle records, proof(s) of insurance, and your transportation worker identification credential).

usage.title: Information Related to Your Use of the Service
usage.content: We automatically collect, record and store certain information related to your use of the Service such as: Your Data (as defined in our Terms of Service), Vehicle information, Information related to your driving of such vehicle (including but not limited to driver performance data, driving time, on and off duty status, etc), Information you send to third parties using the Service, such as any messages sent to third parties via the Service, or the transmission of Department of Transportation inspection reports, Information about your usage of the Service including duration of use, screens or webpages you visit, and other information about your activities within the Service.

device.title: Information Sent by Your Mobile Device
device.content: We collect certain information indirectly from you while you use the Service such as information about the device you use, hardware and software you use when accessing the Service, and your IP address.

location.title: Location Information
location.content: We may collect and store information about your location by converting your IP address into a geo-location or by accessing your mobile device's GPS coordinates via the location services on your device.

sharing.title: How We Share Information with Others
sharing.content: We share your information in the following ways:

service.title: To Provide the Service
service.content: We share information with others in order to provide you with the Service, including: Motor carrier(s) with which you have an employer, contractor or other business relationship, Governmental agencies such as the Department of Transportation or FMCSA upon their request and in order to facilitate transmission of messages and reports by you to these agencies, Third parties with whom we have business relationships in order to provide you with the Service.

providers.title: Our Service Providers
providers.content: We also share information with third parties who provide services to us, including various analytics services, that help us monitor the performance of the Service and make improvements to the Service based on how you and other users are interacting with and using the Service.

legal.title: Compliance with Laws
legal.content: Law enforcement, government officials or other third parties (i) in connection with a formal request, subpoena, court order, or similar legal procedure; or (ii) when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to comply with the law, prevent physical harm or financial loss, report suspected illegal activity, or to investigate violations of our Terms of Use.

choices.title: Your Choices under this Privacy Policy
choices.content: We offer you choices regarding the collection, use and sharing of your information:

optout.title: Choice to Opt-Out
optout.content: We offer you choices regarding the collection, use and sharing of your information including Your Data and Your Personal Information and we will respect the choices you make. Please note that if you decide not to provide us with certain information, you may not be able to access the Service or portions thereof.

modify.title: Opt-Out & Modification
modify.content: If you want to opt-out of providing us information that we collect from you as described in this Privacy Policy, contact us at: info@usfasteld.com. If you would like to modify information that you have provided us within the Service, including Personal Information, you are able to modify certain information by logging into your account.

notifications.title: Notices to You and Changes to this Policy
notifications.content: We may occasionally send you push notifications through our Service, including our mobile application, to send you Service-related notifications or notifications of changes to this Privacy Policy or our Terms of Service. You may at any time opt-out from receiving these types of communications by turning them off at the device level through your settings or through the mobile application settings.

returnsPage.title: Returns
returnsPage.introduction: There are a few important things to keep in mind when returning a product you purchased online from ElbrusElogs:

policy.title: Return Policy
policy.content: Our return policy includes the following key points:

points.timeframe: You have to return an item from the date you received it. You may cancel the contract and return your products for any reason within 7 calendar days of the day you receive the product(s).
points.fault: If a fault is found after 7 days from delivery, you should contact us and we will replace or repair the product, at our discretion.
points.eligibility: Only items that have been purchased directly from bluestareld.com can be returned to us. Items purchased from dealers or resellers and not bluestareld.com directly are not eligible for return, refund or exchange.

process.title: Return Process
process.content: To ensure a smooth return process, please follow these guidelines:

points.contact: To return an item, please contact us.
points.accessories: Please return items with all accessories and packaging. If you do not, we may either deny the return, or allow a return with a nonrefundable deduction on your refund for what is missing.
points.condition: Items need to be returned in a like-new condition. Items that are damaged, unsanitary, dented or scratched may be denied a return.
points.packaging: Pack the item carefully so that it will not be damaged during the shipping process. We suggest using a box and bubble wrap.
points.documentation: Please ensure that the item you're returning is repackaged with all the cords, adapters and documentation that were included when you received it.
points.shipping: It is recommended to use a secure shipping method such as Insured UPS to send the item so that you have tracking for the package. ElbrusElogs is not responsible for items lost in transit and a return can not be processed until the item is received.

address.title: Return Address
address.content:
All returns should be sent to the following address:
ElbrusElogs
340 Webster Ave
Brooklyn NY 11230

Once we receive your item, a refund is initiated immediately. If you canceled a pickup item, and you were billed for it, we initiate your refund immediately after you submit your cancellation request.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.content: For returns by mail, once we receive your return, we will process it within 3â€“5 business days. With a few exceptions, we will reimburse you for returned items in the same way you paid for them. Funds should be available within 5 business days. If you prefer, you can make an exchange for the same item.

help.title: Need Help?
help.content: If you have further questions regarding return and refund policy please feel free to visit our

warrantyPage.title: Product Warranty
warrantyPage.introduction: ElbrusElogs stands behind the quality of our products. Our warranty policy is designed to give you peace of mind when purchasing our ELD devices and accessories.

policy.title: Warranty Policy
policy.content: ElbrusElogs warrants to Customer that any Hardware shall be free of defects in materials and workmanship, for the duration of the applicable Warranty Period. All hardware products come with a one year warranty unless otherwise specified on the relevant ElbrusElogs datasheet.

coverage.title: What's Covered
coverage.content: During the warranty period, hardware exhibiting material defects will be replaced. The Hardware Warranty covers the repair, and if repair is not possible, replacement of any item purchased from us, for 1 year from the date of purchase of the Warranty.

points.manufacturing: Manufacturing defects that affect the functionality of the device
points.electronic: Electronic component failures not caused by external factors
points.software: Software issues that significantly impair the core functionality of the device

claim.title: How to Claim Warranty
claim.content: To receive warranty service, contact us for problem determination and service procedures. The original dated bill of sale must be presented upon request as proof of purchase.

points.contact: Contact our customer support team via email or by phone
points.details: Provide details about the issue you're experiencing, including when it started and any troubleshooting steps you've already taken
points.proof: Be prepared to provide proof of purchase and the serial number of your device
points.inspection: Our technical team may need to inspect the device before approving a warranty claim

exclusions.title: Warranty Exclusions
exclusions.content: These obligations are dependent upon proper use of the products and do not cover:

points.physical: Usage that is not in accordance with product instructions
points.unauthorized: Combination or integration of the product with any features, accessories, software or other materials not installed or provided by ElbrusElogs (unless with ElbrusElogs's explicit consent)
points.misuse: Unauthorized modification, removal or erasing of the barcode serial numbers or other identifying marks on the products
points.software: Products for which ElbrusElogs has not received payment

extended.title: Additional Information
extended.content: The Limited Hardware Warranty does not cover Internet connectivity with the Hardware and interruptions in electric power. This Limited Hardware Warranty will only apply to the actual purchaser and end-user of the Hardware, and this Limited Hardware Warranty is not available for products that have been altered or modified, or that were purchased used or from any source other than ElbrusElogs.

legalNotice.title: Need Additional Help?
legalNotice.content: If you have other queries, please send us a message, call us, or email us, using our Contact Us page.
